programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: You Are Not Alone
programme.desc: When Eva returns to her house on the day of her divorce, she finds a bouquet of red roses outside the door. Attached is the note: "You are not alone." The sender is anonymous.

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Child Star
programme.desc: 9-year old rising star Robin feels bored and envious of kids playing outside. When he tries to sneak out, his overstrict mother catches him, sparking a wild chase and an emotional confrontation.

programme.title: Alpha.
programme.desc: Seeking solitude after his mother’s death, Rein retreats to the Alps as a snowboard instructor. But when his boisterous father Gijs visits, tensions erupt on a treacherous mountain hike—until nature turns their rivalry into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victim’s family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: A man’s journey to deliver a package turns into a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victim’s family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: The Odd-Job Men
programme.desc: A week in the life of Moha, Valero and Pep - workers in a small plumbing and electricity company in the outskirts of Barcelona, Spain. Moha is on a one-week trial period and is set to replace Pep, but Valero doesn't think he has what it takes.

programme.title: A Perfect Fit
programme.desc: A big city lawyer with impossible standards, Katharina is sure that carpenter Mike is not the one for her. Though Mike does not meet any of her criteria, there seems to be an unexplainable spark between the unlikely couple.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.
